ygData.subject: Re: Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a girl, and my character looks darned good if I say so myself ;o) My sister plays (Immerzenla), my daughter (Megganeggin) and my neighbor s daughter
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a girl, and my character looks darned good if I say so myself ;o)
My sister plays (Immerzenla), my daughter (Megganeggin) and my
neighbor's daughter (Daffny).

Question: I had a marriage proposal from a Barbarian Warrior when I
was last in North Qeynos in the newbie area. What's that all about?
Do characters get married in-game? Also, I had someone ask if I
wanted to go to Crow's for a fish sandwich, and someone asked if I
wanted to go to the Lion's Mane for an ale. I get more propositions
in-game then in real-life! Dang, that's sad isn't it hahahahhhaha!

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Richard" <soulfire18_01@y...>
wrote:
> Me and my friend were having a discussion the other night while he
> was playing eq, he was talking to his eq wife, and i was messing
> with him, and if brought up the questions of, are there really
girls
> that play eq, or are the all guys. Then he asked me, if there are
> girls that play, are they cute? Just curious.
